Helper_SendTXTEmail: SELECT TXT_TITLE "txt_title",TXT_BODY "txt_body",TXT_BCC "txt_bcc",TXT_TYPE "txt_type" FROM JSHARMONY.TXT WHERE TXT_PROCESS='EMAIL' and TXT_ATTRIB=@txt_attrib
HelperRender_getTXT: SELECT TXT_BODY "txt_body" FROM JSHARMONY.TXT WHERE TXT_PROCESS=@txt_process AND TXT_ATTRIB=@txt_attrib
